name: viteseo-ttf-child/key-takeaways
title: Key Takeaways
description: A styled list of key takeaways with a bordered box and checkmarks.

default: 123 Form Builder is an online platform for building and managing web forms without coding skills.
It streamlines data collection, automates processes, and integrates with popular apps and website builders.
Features include drag-and-drop design, conditional logic, payment integration, and real-time analytics.
It is often confused with simple form plugins but supports advanced workflows and enterprise use.
Widely used in ecommerce, education, healthcare, and event management for efficient, scalable data handling.
